name: Stealing the color of the universe
name_original: Stealing the color of the universe
description:
This is my first game, and it is also my first Game Jam.

I learned a lot and I had too many mistakes, for example, I FORGOT THE SOUND OF THE GAME. But well, you have to learn from the good and bad things and keep improving.

Thank you very much for getting this far.

Twitter: @TarvefDev

All the pixel art was made by me. The next links are resources of code and the font that I used:

Font - https://www.1001fonts.com/blox-brk-font.html

Timer - https://gamedevtraum.com/es/desarrollo-de-videojuegos/tutoriales-y-soluciones-un...

Basic movement -
